settings.name: Awan Gurun Gunarso
settings.title: AI Operations Language Data Analyst
settings.summary: Experienced AI Operations Language Data Analyst with expertise in data annotation, content moderation, and ethical AI practices.

items.description: Utilized in-house tools for audio transcription and data annotation, reviewed online/offline content, performed quality evaluations, managed content moderation projects, developed operational guidelines for Responsible AI, delivered high-quality transcriptions for AI/ML training, collaborated with cross-regional teams for training and onboarding, and streamlined wellbeing activities.
Recruited, coordinated, and evaluated 7 tutors, planned and supervised Face-to-Face tutorials as Student Coordinator, and conducted academic evaluations.

items.company: PT. Bank Rakyat Indonesia. Persero Tbk
items.description: Processed customer transactions, maintained cash drawers, advised on banking products, conducted primary research on banking products, compiled financial/statistical information, and provided in-person/phone support to customers.

items.title: Facilitator in the 'Transcription Workshop' project
items.description: Simulated real production procedures, enhancing teammates' comprehension of the production and review process and maintaining knowledge of the guidelines.

items.title: Lead Facilitator in the 'Knowledge Sharing' session
items.description: Enhanced team collaboration and understanding of key concepts by sharing insights.

items.title: Member of the 'Be Well Champion' Pillar team project
items.description: Created diverse and engaging activities to foster better team environments and increase team morale.

items.title: Captain leader of the Sustainability Initiative project named 'Ecochallenge 2022'
items.description: Engaged all Full-Time Employees (FTE) in community-based sustainability learning and activities, empowering them to make sustainable changes.

items.description: Participated in Calibration Exercise HITApp and Training HITApp Update, contributed to project success by recruiting Ground Truth Specialists and facilitating launch of initiatives.
